import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Home() { const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Silk Midi Dress', price: 'R1,599', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1595777457583-95e059d581b8?w=400&h=500&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' }, { id: 2, name: 'Linen Wrap Dress', price: 'R1,349', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1594633312681-425c7b97ccd1?w=400&h=500&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' }, { id: 3, name: 'Cotton Sundress', price: 'R1,169', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515372039744-b8f02a3ae446?w=400&h=500&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' }, { id: 4, name: 'Chiffon Maxi', price: 'R1,699', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566479179817-c0b5b4b4b1e8?w=400&h=500&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' }, { id: 5, name: 'Summer Slip Dress', price: 'R809', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1572804013309-59a88b7e92f1?w=400&h=500&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' }, { id: 6, name: 'Boho Midi Dress', price: 'R989', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1583496661160-fb5886a13d24?w=400&h=500&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' } ]; const categories = [ { name: 'Midi Dresses', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1595777457583-95e059d581b8?w=300&h=200&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' }, { name: 'Maxi Dresses', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566479179817-c0b5b4b4b1e8?w=300&h=200&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' }, { name: 'Summer Styles', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515372039744-b8f02a3ae446?w=300&h=200&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' }, { name: 'Sale Items', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1572804013309-59a88b7e92f1?w=300&h=200&fit=crop&auto=format&q=80' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Summer Dresses

Perfect for every occasion

Shop Now
{/* Categories */}

Categories

{categories.map((category, index) => (

{category.name}

))}
{/* Featured Products */}

New Arrivals

{products.map(product => (

{product.name}

{product.price}

))}
); } export default Home;
